title: Unit 3: More
section: Evaluated Python code chunk, with a plot
text:
Evaluated Python code chunk, with a plot


Code
import numpy as np
x = np.random.normal(size=100)
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.hist(x)
plt.show()
np.mean(x)









-0.01445769230025498
